name: Baby Boom
tagline: The life of super-yuppie J.C. is thrown into turmoil when she inherits a baby from a distant relative.

name: Oculus
tagline: A woman tries to exonerate her brother, who was convicted of murder, by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon.

name: Prizzi's Honor
tagline: A professional hit man and hit woman fall in love.

name: Winnie the Pooh
tagline: Eeyore has lost his tail, and Winnie the Pooh and his friends hold a contest to get him a new one.

name: El Cid
tagline: The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz (a.k.a. El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.

name: The Host
tagline: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie will risk everything to protect the people she cares most about, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

name: Event Horizon
tagline: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.

name: Machete
tagline: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

name: Harriet the Spy
tagline: Harriet M. Welsch is a spy. But when Harriet's friends find her secret notebook the tables are turned on her. Can she win her friends back and still keep on going with the spy business?

name: Basic
tagline: A DEA agent investigates the disappearance of a legendary Army ranger drill sergeant and several of his cadets during a training exercise gone severely awry.

name: Bulworth
tagline: A suicidally disillusioned liberal politician puts a contract out on himself and takes the opportunity to be bluntly honest with his voters by affecting the rhythms and speech of hip-hop music and culture.

name: An American Werewolf in Paris
tagline: An American man unwittingly gets involved with werewolves who have developed a serum allowing them to transform at will.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
tagline: In the dreams of his victims, a spectral child murderer stalks the children of the members of the lynch mob that killed him.

name: Blast from the Past
tagline: A romantic comedy about a naive man who comes out into the world after being in a nuclear fallout shelter for 35 years.

name: Draft Day
tagline: At the NFL Draft, general manager Sonny Weaver has the opportunity to rebuild his team when he trades for the number one pick. He must decide what he's willing to sacrifice on a life-changing day for a few hundred young men with NFL dreams.

name: Book of Shadows: Blair Witch 2
tagline: College students at a Boston college become fascinated by the events of the three missing filmmakers in Maryland, so they decide to go into the same woods and find out what really happened.

name: Street Kings
tagline: An undercover cop, disillusioned by the recent murder of his wife, is implicated in the murder of an officer and must struggle to clear himself.

name: One for the Money
tagline: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

name: A Passage to India
tagline: Cultural mistrust and false accusations doom a friendship in British colonial India between an Indian doctor, an Englishwoman engaged to marry a city magistrate, and an English educator.

name: Conan the Destroyer
tagline: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

name: Boogie Nights
tagline: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

name: I.Q.
tagline: Albert Einstein helps a young man who's in love with Einstein's niece to catch her attention by pretending temporarily to be a great physicist.

name: Great Expectations
tagline: Modernization of Charles Dickens classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.

name: Houseguest
tagline: In hot water with the mob over an unpaid debt, a con man poses as a family friend in an affluent Pennsylvania suburb.

name: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
tagline: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace, and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

name: Private Lessons
tagline: An immigrant housemaid seduces a 15-year-old boy and later fakes her own death as part of his chauffeur's blackmail plot. Troubles arise when the two start to fall in love.

name: The Wrestler
tagline: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

name: Micki + Maude
tagline: A bigamist must keep his wives from meeting each other, which becomes tricky when they're both pregnant.

name: Blood Work
tagline: Still recovering from a heart transplant, a retired FBI profiler returns to service when his own blood analysis offers clues to the identity of a serial killer.

name: A Man Apart
tagline: A man known as Diablo emerges to head a drug cartel after the previous leader is imprisoned.

name: Ramona and Beezus
tagline: Follows the misadventures of young grade schooler Ramona Quimby from Beverly Cleary's popular children's book series.

name: Jacob's Ladder
tagline: Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam vet attempts to discover his past while suffering from a severe case of disassociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusion, and perception of death.

name: The Exorcist III
tagline: A police lieutenant in Georgetown mourns the anniversary of a priest's death as a serial killer strikes.

name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
tagline: Set back in the 80s when Harry met Lloyd in high school where they cross paths with a mean principal and a bunch of other outcasts much like themselves.

name: xXx: State of the Union
tagline: Darius Stone, a new agent in the XXX program, is sent to Washington, DC to defuse a power struggle amongst national leaders.

name: That Awkward Moment
tagline: Three best friends find themselves where we've all been - at that confusing moment in every dating relationship when you have to decide "So...where is this going?"

name: The Descent
tagline: A caving expedition goes horribly wrong, as the explorers become trapped and ultimately pursued by a strange breed of predators.

name: The World's End
tagline: Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from 20 years earlier unwittingly become humankind's only hope for survival.

name: The Adventures of Rocky & Bullwinkle
tagline: When enemies Boris, Natasha and Fearless leader escape into the real world with a nefarious scheme, Rocky & Bullwinkle do the same and team up with a young F.B.I. agent to stop the trio.

name: Planet of the Apes
tagline: An astronaut crew crash lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.

name: Howards End
tagline: A businessman thwarts his wife's bequest of an estate to another woman.

name: Shutter
tagline: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after a tragic accident. Fearing the manifestations may be connected, they investigate and learn that some mysteries are better left unsolved.

name: The Nanny Diaries
tagline: A college graduate goes to work as a nanny for a rich New York family. Ensconced in their home, she has to juggle their dysfunction, a new romance, and the spoiled brat in her charge.

name: The Cotton Club
tagline: The Cotton Club was a famous night club in Harlem. The story follows the people that visited the club, those that ran it, and is peppered with the Jazz music that made it so famous.

name: The Hard Way
tagline: An action film star researching a role is allowed to tag along with a hardboiled New York cop, who finds him superficial and irritating.

name: Innerspace
tagline: A hapless store clerk must foil criminals to save the life of the man who, miniaturized in a secret experiment, was accidentally injected into him.

name: Superhero Movie
tagline: Orphaned high school student Rick Riker is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, develops super powers (except for the ability to fly), and becomes a hero.

name: Alex Cross
tagline: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled serial killer who specializes in torture and pain.

name: Æon Flux
tagline: Aeon Flux is a mysterious assassin working for the Monicans, a group of rebels trying to overthrow the government. When she is a sent on a mission to kill the Chairman, a whole new mystery is found.

name: Shadowlands
tagline: C.S. Lewis, a world-renowned Christian theologian, writer and professor, leads a passionless life until he meets a spirited poet from the U.S.

name: Betrayed
tagline: An FBI agent posing as a combine driver becomes romantically involved with a Midwest farmer who lives a double life as a white supremacist.

name: That Thing You Do!
tagline: A Pennsylvania band scores a hit in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as it can, with lots of help from its manager.

name: Candyman
tagline: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

name: Frida
tagline: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

name: Mr. Woodcock
tagline: Taken aback by his mother's wedding announcement, a young man returns home in an effort to stop her from marrying his old high school gym teacher, a man who made high school hell for generations of students.

name: You Again
tagline: When a young woman realizes her brother is about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school, she sets out to expose the fiancée's true colors.

name: 21 & Over
tagline: The night before his big medical school interview, a promising student celebrates his 21st birthday with his two best friends.

name: Desperado
tagline: A gunslinger is embroiled in a war with a local drug runner.

name: Dance Flick
tagline: Street dancer Thomas Uncles is from the wrong side of the tracks, but his bond with the beautiful Megan White might help the duo realize their dreams as the enter in the mother of all dance battles.

name: Peyton Place
tagline: A peaceful New England town hides secrets and scandals.

name: The Outsiders
tagline: When two poor greasers, Johnny, and Ponyboy are assaulted by a vicious gang, the socs, and Johnny kills one of the attackers, tension begins to mount between the two rival gangs, setting off a turbulent chain of events.

name: The Mist
tagline: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

name: Crocodile Dundee in Los Angeles
tagline: Mick Dundee travels to the city of smog and stars with his young son in tow.

name: Billy Madison
tagline: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

name: Nancy Drew
tagline: Teen detective Nancy Drew accompanies her father on a business trip to Los Angeles, where she happens upon clues to a murder mystery involving a movie star.

name: Her
tagline: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with his newly purchased operating system that's designed to meet his every need.

name: Memento
tagline: A man, suffering from short-term memory loss, uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

name: Captain Corelli's Mandolin
tagline: When a fisherman leaves to fight with the Greek army during WWII, his fiancee falls in love with the local Italian commander.

name: Halloween II
tagline: Laurie Strode is rushed to the hospital, while Sheriff Brackett and Dr. Loomis hunt the streets for Michael Myers, who has found Laurie at the Haddonfield Hospital.

name: My Father the Hero
tagline: A teenage girl on vacation in the Bahamas with her divorced father tries to impress a potential boyfriend by saying that her father is actually her lover.

name: Dark Water
tagline: A mother and daughter, still wounded from a bitter custody dispute, hole up in a run-down apartment building. Adding further drama to their plight, they are targeted by the ghost of former resident.

name: The Fourth Kind
tagline: A thriller involving an ongoing unsolved mystery in Alaska, where one town has seen an extraordinary number of unexplained disappearances during the past 40 years and there are accusations of a federal cover up.

name: Mimic
tagline: Three years ago entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease, now the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind!

name: The International
tagline: An Interpol agent attempts to expose a high-profile financial institution's role in an international arms dealing ring.

name: Tin Men
tagline: A minor car accident drives two rival aluminum-siding salesmen to the ridiculous extremes of man versus man in 1963 Baltimore.

name: Escape from L.A.
tagline: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

name: Can't Hardly Wait
tagline: Multicharacter teenage comedy about high school graduates with different agenda of life on graduation night.

name: Serenity
tagline: The crew of the ship Serenity tries to evade an assassin sent to recapture one of their number who is telepathic.

name: The Woman in Red
tagline: On his way to work, Teddy spots Charlotte - an incredibly beautiful Woman in Red. He really wants to meet her - but what would his wife say?

name: The Transporter
tagline: This film is about a man whose job is to deliver packages without asking any questions. Complications arise when he breaks those rules.

name: Jersey Girl
tagline: After his career is sidelined from an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup, a single man must take care of his precocious daughter.

name: Escape from New York
tagline: In 1997, when the US President crashes into Manhattan, now a giant max. security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in for a rescue.

name: Alien Nation
tagline: A few years from now, Earth will have the first contact with an alien civilization. These aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after years of quarantine.
